mapper.select: select count(board_no) from board where board_category = #{boardCategory} and del_status = 0 and to_char(b_postdate, 'yymmdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yymmdd')

select count(board_no) from board where board_category = #{boardCategory} and del_status = 0
and board_subject like '%'||#{word}||'%'
and b_user_id like '%'||#{word}||'%'
and b_school_name like '%'||#{word}||'%'

select count(*) from board b, ( select count(*) lc, board_no from love where like_unlike = 'L' group by board_no ) l where b.board_no = l.board_no and l.lc*1 + b.b_view_count*0.1 >= 5 and TRUNC(sysdate - to_date(b.b_postdate)) = 0
